name: Frost Spells
description: Frost spells do less damage than other more destructive types of spells, but can slow down enemies or increase your armor.

name: Fire Spells
description: Fire spells do a great deal of damage and strike many opponents at once.

name: Shadow Spells
description: Shadow spells have the potential to do a massive amount of damage, but their strength lies in debilitating opponents and buffing dark allies.

name: Lightning Spells
description: Lightning spells do a lot of damage to single target enemies, or less damage split across more enemies.

name: Earth Spells
description: Earth spells do physical damage instead of the usual magic damage.

name: Arcane Spells
description: Arcane spells are much stronger than their elemental archetypes, but cost more mana as a result.

name: Potions
description: Consumable potions which have restorative or enhancement properties.

name: Healing Spells
description: Healing spells are a non-offensive category of spell that heals all targets regardless of resistances.
